Description: Imported & local seafood, plus lunch & take-home meals, from a long-standing market stall.

summary.snippet: "Crispy fried wild gulf shrimp with a sweet/spicy Thai sauce."
"Great service, excellent vibe and superb fish & chips at the lunch counter."
"Got home to discover the pieces of salmon were nothing but slivers of meat."

most_relevant.description: Everytime we are in the area we go here! My favorite is the skate fish, absolutely delicious! Think my husband got the fish and chips. All fresh cooked for you!

You can not go wrong here - try the chowder, it's delicious!!!  Try the fish and chips!!!  They are amazing.  Calamari!!  Comes with a house Thai sauce....even their tartar sauce deserves accolades!!

Then the staff - friendly.....so friendly and knowledgeable!!!!

One of the few places I would give 6 stars

Fantastic quality seafood. The 3 East coast oysters available when we visited were all excellent, and the teriyaki marinated tuna made for a fun poke-esque raw snack on its own (though the staff will tell you it's a "searing tuna" and not a sushi/sashimi grade cut - which should tell you how good their other cuts are!)

Ran over when I saw the post for the soft shell crab lunch special! Lightly seasoned with a dusting of batter and nicely fried... came with a side of slaw. Sooo good!

Got the the salmon burger (bit thinner than expected in size) with homemade Cajun fries for someone else. Food was good, sauce was tasty and hit the spot for lunch.
Ordered the Fish and Chips and a cole slaw. Either I was unaware that the chips had to be added on as an extra, or the person forgot to add them
Very lively, fast-paced, open market style fresh fish spot. Choose your fillet from beds of ice and they will prepare it perfectly according to your preferences. Fun spot to grab a tasty lunch.

We love Monaghan’s! We try to get our 4 yr old as involved as possible in understanding food and helping cook. She wanted to wait at the counter while they prepared our Black Bass and when I came back, she had made a friend and was learning about Makerel! Always great for a quick and high quality lunch too!

Full of soul and salmon and shrimp all of your FRESH Seafood needs. I was going to tell you my latest groovy thing that I do there but then everybody will do it. There's plenty of good food to take away or eat there. If you want a hot meal you have to get there by 3:00 p.m.
